mapper.sql: uuid AS "uuid" ,dsi_uuid AS "dsiUuid" ,dsi_name AS "dsiName" ,title AS "title" ,url AS "url" ,pretitlt AS "pretitlt" ,subtitle AS "subtitle" ,pubtime AS "pubtime" ,author AS "author" ,editor AS "editor" ,abstracts AS "abstracts" ,content AS "content" ,tag_content AS "tagContent" ,website_pictures AS "websitePictures" ,local_pictures AS "localPictures" ,pictures_description AS "picturesDescription" ,language AS "language" ,website_thumbnail AS "websiteThumbnail" ,local_thumbnail AS "localThumbnail" ,website_pdf AS "websitePdf" ,local_pdf AS "localPdf" ,ha AS "ha" ,channel AS "channel" ,number AS "number" ,page AS "page" ,page_name AS "pageName" ,paper_count AS "paperCount" ,front_page AS "frontPage" ,insert_time AS "insertTime" ,remark AS "remark" ,state AS "state" ,creator AS "creator" ,create_time AS "createTime" ,update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select date_format( pubtime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS 'pubtime', dsi_uuid AS 'dsiUuid', dsi_name AS 'dsiName', creator AS 'creator', count(*) AS 'dataVolume' from wg_ele_news_data where 1 = 1
and (pubtime between CONCAT(#{pubTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{pubTime},' 23:59:59'))
and dsi_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
GROUP BY date_format( pubtime, '%Y-%m-%d' ),dsi_name
